entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a character in the story who is questioning Karkaroff about his accusations.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a character in the story who is accusing others of being Death Eaters.

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is a person accused by Karkaroff of helping to murder the McKinnons.

entities.name: mulciber
entities.description: Mulciber is a person accused by Karkaroff of specializing in the Imperius Curse and forcing people to do horrific things.

entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is a spy who passed information from inside the Ministry to He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.

relationships.description: Karkaroff accuses Travers of helping to murder the McKinnons.
Karkaroff accuses Mulciber of specializing in the Imperius Curse and forcing people to do horrific things.
Karkaroff accuses Rookwood of being a spy who passed information from inside the Ministry to He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.
Mr. Crouch is interrogating Karkaroff about his accusations.
